title: By when should one start his class 11 syllabus? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey Ayush! I will recommend you to start your class-11th syllabus from the beginning of the session itself… Although class-11 grades do not matter at all.. and therefore many children end up postponing or neglecting studies for the sake of high school enjoyment… But trust me… studies of class-11th are conceptual and prepare your base for class-12th.. so if you are planning to score good in your boards next to next year.. then you should have a clarity of class-11th subjects as well as concepts too.. Since in this lockdown situation you won't be able to focus much on studies… but do believe in the power of self study.. and contribute some time daily on practical subjects…. Hope this helps.. Goodluck Stay safe Stuti..

One Should Start his Syllabus as Early as Possible When you Finishes off your Class 10th,just Start then like After 2 days of your Final Exams of Class 10th But you would not have Books at that time,So you Can Get Old Books from your Seniors OR Study from Youtube Best of Luck!

Start as soon as you begin with your 11th grade. If you're feeling extra meticulous then start right after your 10th boards are over. Class 11 syllabus is huge and you will not be able to cope up if you don't start from the beginning. Speaking out of experience.
जब जागो तभी सवेरा you May start as early as possible don’t wait for results what subjects you want to take decide first and start self studies with easy to hard lessons one by one .
